#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<fstream>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{	
	
	//ifstream fin("problem5_input.txt");
	//ofstream fout("problem5_output.txt");
	
	long long int testcase;
	
	long long int no=1;
	while(scanf("%lld",&testcase))
	{
		//cin>>testcase;
		//if(testcase=='#')
		//	break;
		//int no = (int)testcase;
		no = testcase;
		long count=0;
		long page=9;
		long dig=9;
		long zero=10;
		int i=0;
		while(dig<no)
		{
			no=no-dig;
			count=count+page;
			page=page*10;
			i++;
			dig=9*(i+1)*zero;
			zero*=10;
			if(i==8)
			break;
		}
		if(no%(i+1)==0){
		count=count+(no/(i+1));
		cout<<count<<"\n";}
		else
		cout<<"Impossible!"<<"\n";	
	}
	return 0;
}
